section.intro.name: Hinny Tsang
section.intro.headline: Data Scientist / Quant / Developer
section.intro.summary: Data Scientist with strong programming expertise and hands-on experience building analytical tools, risk infrastructure, and ML models in quantitative trading. Entrepreneurial mindset with experience leading greenfield projects.
section.education.title: Educations
section.education.hkust.title: BSc in Physics
section.education.hkust.org: Hong Kong University of Science and Technology
section.education.hkust.desc: Minor in Information Technology (core CS courses), Astronomy & Cosmology. University Scholarship recipient and Dean's List 2019 - 2020.
section.education.cuhk.title: MPhil in Physics
section.education.cuhk.org: The Chinese University of Hong Kong
section.education.cuhk.desc: Developed turbulence driving module in a computational magnetohydrodynamics code. Published in RASTI.
section.education.uva.title: Visiting Scholar
section.education.uva.desc: NASA GPU Hackathon 2022 — achieved 8x acceleration of hydrodynamic code with OpenACC GPU parallelization.
section.education.wqu.title: MSc in Financial Engineering
section.oursky.title: Software Engineer
section.oursky.desc: Full-stack lease management system with React and Java Spring Boot. Set up Docker containerization and CI/CD with GitHub Actions on GCP Kubernetes.
section.smartone.title: Data Science Associate
section.smartone.desc: Built recommendation model improving customer retention by 5%. Developed X-learner uplift model with PySpark ETL reducing churn by 7%. Labelled 100M+ daily web logs using hierarchical clustering on Spark.
section.pollock.title: Data Scientist
section.pollock.desc: End-to-end quantitative models for statistical arbitrage (Sharpe 2.1). Built ETL pipelines with Bloomberg SAPI/BQL. Deployed Apache Airflow orchestrating 30+ pipelines with MLflow tracking. Internal analytics tools used daily by PM.
section.cta.title: What's next?
section.cta.subtitle: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations.
